consulting.title: AI Consulting
consulting.description: We guide you through the AI journey, from identifying opportunities to designing effective strategies and selecting the right technologies.
consulting.longDescription: Our expert consultants work closely with your team to understand your unique challenges and opportunities. We provide strategic guidance on AI adoption, help you build a roadmap for implementation, and ensure your AI initiatives align with your business objectives.

features.assessment: AI maturity assessment for your organization

agents.title: AI Agent Development
agents.description: We build intelligent agents that automate tasks, enhance customer experiences, and provide actionable insights tailored to your needs.
agents.longDescription: From conversational AI assistants to autonomous decision-making systems, we design and develop AI agents that work seamlessly with your existing processes. Our agents are built to learn, adapt, and improve over time, delivering increasing value to your organization.

benefits.title: Key benefits
items: Up to 60% reduction in operational costs

optimization.title: Process Optimization
optimization.description: Our AI models streamline workflows with predictive analytics and automation to reduce costs and boost efficiency.
optimization.longDescription: We analyze your current processes to identify bottlenecks and inefficiencies. Using advanced machine learning and predictive analytics, we implement solutions that automate repetitive tasks, optimize resource allocation, and drive operational excellence.

features.predictive: Predictive models for demand and resources

benefits.title: Key benefits
items: Up to 40% reduction in cycle times

custom.title: Custom AI Solutions
custom.description: We develop tailor-made AI solutions—computer vision, NLP, generative AI—to solve your most complex challenges.
custom.longDescription: Every business has unique challenges that require bespoke solutions. Whether you need computer vision for quality control, natural language processing for document analysis, or generative AI for content creation, we build custom solutions that address your specific needs.

features.vision: Computer vision for inspection and analysis
features.generative: Generative AI for content and design

benefits.title: Key benefits
items: 100% tailored solution for your use case

about.title: What is WebExpress?
about.description: We specialize in creating professional websites for local businesses that need online presence FAST.
about.highlightText: Instead of starting from scratch and making you wait months, we research your business, analyze your competition, and arrive with a proposal ALMOST READY. You review, we adjust together, and in one week you're online.
about.noTemplates: We don't use generic templates. Each website is designed specifically for your type of business, with your information, your photos, and your style.

forWho.title: Who is WebExpress For?
forWho.subtitle: Ideal for local businesses that need professional online presence

items.noWeb: Businesses WITHOUT a website or with outdated ones

research.title: Research
items: We gather information about your business
We get photos if you need them

design.title: Custom Design
design.description: We don't use templates. Each website is designed specifically for your type of business.

seo.description: Configured so Google finds you. Meta tags, Schema.org, sitemap, and speed <2 seconds.

fast.title: Ultra Fast Loading

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: No fine print. No hidden costs.

payment.title: Payment Methods

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: 7 days on average. Not months of waiting. Your competition is already online, you should be too.

price.title: Fair Price
price.description: No fine print. No hidden costs. You know exactly what you pay and what you receive.

personal.title: Personal Touch
personal.description: You work directly with the developer. No intermediaries. We explain everything in plain language.

design.title: Design that Stands Out
design.description: We don't use generic templates. Your website reflects YOUR business, not a downloaded template.

tech.title: Proven Technology
tech.description: Clean and optimized code. No slow WordPress. Fast website = happy customers.

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: If you're not satisfied within 30 days, we refund 100% of your money. No questions asked.

really7days.question: Really in 7 days?
really7days.answer: Yes. The standard process is: Day 1-2 we gather info, Day 3-4 we develop, Day 5 review with you, Day 6-7 adjustments and launch. It can be faster if you have all the content ready.

whatINeed.question: What do I need to prepare?
whatINeed.answer: Ideally: logo (if you have one), photos of your business/products, text about your services, your social media. But if you don't have anything, no problem. We'll get it.

changes.question: Can I make changes later?
changes.answer: Of course. We include 2 rounds of changes during development. After launch, you can hire maintenance ($20/month), pay for specific changes ($40/hour), or learn to edit basic content.

technical.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
technical.answer: Not at all. We take care of EVERYTHING: domain, hosting, email, configuration, publishing. You just provide your business content.

domain.question: What about the domain?
domain.answer: If you already have one (.com, .es): we use it. If you don't: we help you register one (~$10/year). You are always the owner.

ecommerce.question: Can I sell products online?
ecommerce.answer: The basic pack does NOT include e-commerce. But we can add a product catalog where people see prices and contact you. For a full store with payments, it's a different project.

mobile.question: Does it work on mobile?
mobile.answer: 100%. In fact, we optimize for mobile first because 75% of searches are from phones.

google.question: Will I appear on Google automatically?
google.answer: Your website will be SEO optimized, but appearing on the first page takes time (1-3 months) and depends on competition. We lay the groundwork.

afterYear.question: What happens after the first year of hosting?
afterYear.answer: Options: renewal (~$50-80/year), maintenance ($20/month includes hosting + updates), or migrate to your own hosting (we help for free).

guarantee.question: Do you offer a guarantee?
guarantee.answer: Yes. If you're not satisfied within 30 days, we refund 100% of your money. No questions. No complications.

cta.title: Ready for Your Professional Website?
cta.subtitle: Tell us about your business and we'll prepare a personalized proposal NO COMMITMENT
